title: [Feat]:Mic volume is automatically turning down while one meet
body:
### Describe the feature

I understand that this is a chromium feature. WebRTC mic volume control. But it is so annoying that the mic automatically turning down while on meet. Need an option to access chrome://flags in teams or an option to disable this feature.

### Motivation

The other person can not hear what I'm saying because the mic has turned down its volume automatically while on a meeting.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
